job.title: Software Data Engineer
job.description: strongNows our time to inspire the future of healthcare togetherbrbrstrongSiemens Healthineers is a leading global medical technology company with over 170 years of experience and 18000 patents More than 48000 dedicated colleagues in over 70 countries are driven to shape the future of healthcare We stand with our customers around the world to support them in delivering high quality care to their patients An estimated 5 million patients across the globe benefit every day from our innovative technologies and services in the areas of diagnostic and therapeutic imaging laboratory diagnostics and molecular medicine as well as digital health and enterprise services This is what truly matters to usbrbrJoin our team now at Siemens Healthineers as strongemSoftware Data EngineerbrbremstrongstrongThis is a role well suited to an ambitious professional looking for the next step in their career As a emSoftware Data Engineerem you will be responsible forstrongbrbrulliYou will be Implementing and testing optimized data access layers using stored procedures views and functionsliliIn your activities you will be utilizing available SQL techniques to efficiently fulfill business needs Set based logic Ranking aggregation and windowing functions bulk data processing XML  backup Restore Reporting  ETL ELT data Integration SSDTliliYou will be Architecting building and maintaining Modern Data pipelines on Azure platformliliYou will be designing Database Transaction Strategy managing concurrency and defining transactions scopesliliYou will be responsible for database performance tuning and monitoring hardware sizing and data storage optimizationliliYou will be interacting and collaborating with application developers to implement customer facing featuresliliYou will be owning the overall database agenda and roadmapbrbrliulstrongThis position may suit you best if you are familiar with what is below and would like to do develop your career with HealthineersbrbrstrongulliYou must demonstrate proven knowledge of SQL Server and strong TSQL skillsliliYou are Database Engineer at heart capable and keen on dealing with all aspects related to RDBMs Architecture Development Administration Tuning and Testing for a commercial productliliYou have designed amp implemented data access layer for Medical diagnostics applicationliliYou have Designed amp Implemented data integration solutions to support AI and business analyticliliYou are keen on collaborating and promoting teamwork and have excellent attention to details with no compromise on qualityliliYou must demonstrate high level of critical thinking in bringing successful resolution to high impact complex and cross functional problemsbrbrliulstrongRequired skills to have for the success of this rolebrbrstrongulliBachelors degree in relevant discipline with Minimum of 58 years of Database developer or Database administrator experienceliliExperience with 2 or the following technologies Azure Data Factory IoThubEvent hubs Stream analytics Power BI and ADLS Elastic Search Spark DatabricksliliExperience in TSQL is a must plus one of the following languages Python R Scala PowerShellliliExperience with Data ingestion log analytics system monitoring and dashboardingbrbrliulstrongSiemens Healthineers has recently announced the next steps in our continued commitment to prioritize colleague health comply with customerbusiness partner requirements and help preserve our business continuity Going forward please be aware that Siemens Healthineers requires full vaccination for COVID19 for our US employees contractors and business partners where local conditions allow whobrbrstrongulli Are customerfacing eg those required to visit a customerbusiness partner site or interact inperson with customers at any conference or meeting ORlili Come onsite whether regularly or occasionally at any Siemens Healthineers locationbrbrliulstrongNote Accommodations may be requested for certain medical or religious reasonsbrbrstrongAt Siemens Healthineers we value those who dedicate their energy and passion to a greater cause Our people make us unique as an employer in the medtech industry What unites and motivates our global team is the inspiration of our common purpose To innovate for healthcare building on our remarkable legacy of pioneering ideas that translate into even better healthcare products and services We recognize that taking ownership of our work allows both us and the company to grow We offer you a flexible and dynamic environment and the space to move beyond your comfort zone to grow both personally and professionallybrbrstrongIf you want to join us in transforming the way healthcare is delivered visit our career site at
